'''Frostbloom Kamifubuki''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s Level 3 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|Kamifubuki|ja=紙吹雪}} means "confetti." The kanji in the word literally means "paper snowstorm."
